name: Eduana
description:
In a infinitely distant past, as the world is about to drasticaly shift, Eduana ventures into the forest to face her sister, a formidable warlord with a frightening vision for the future. 

As Eduana, face ancient creatures from pantheons long dead, befriend a Sphinx, and confront the uncertainty of divine boons.

A small dungeon crawler for the 2023 Dungeon Crawler Jam.
The theme was duality so I made a bunch of stuff, like a plot centered on twins and a battle system  centered on a heads-or-tails system.
x x x 

Made on RPG maker MV, because it's fun but also I think the game is super broken.
I spent a lot of time on visuals, so I wrote the end on the succint story while sleep deprived and I couldn't find the strength to work on sound. 
But I think there's something to be made with what I've started so maybe I'll go back to it someday.
Maybe on another - more fitted- engine. 

Time was short so I didn't really do any level design? :)
And also zero balancing.
I'm glad I did this, tho. I really dig the vibes of the old SMT games and working on mirroring that with my own work was fun. 

x x x 
All visuals made by me.
Font is OpenDyslexic by Abelardo Gonzalez.
Sound effects are from the RPG Maker RTP
